input_args.instruction:
'Instructions: 
Use the Context provided as follows:
1. Options:
	The correct answer is always included in given list. 
	Use the options to filter out irrelevant details provided in the context.

2. Genes and Variants:
	Only focus on the information about the genes and variants.
	Please ignore the other information.
Context: 
Disease cutaneous lupus erythematosus associates Gene HLA-DQA1. Variant rs3131060 associates Disease cutaneous lupus erythematosus. Variant rs9267531 associates Disease cutaneous lupus erythematosus. Variant rs116041786 associates Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene NFE2L2. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene NFKB2. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene TNFRSF11A. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene TNFRSF13C. Variant rs34069391 associates Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency.. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene BLNK. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene ZBTB24. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene CTLA4. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene TCF3. Variant rs11299600 associates Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency. Variant rs1990760 associates Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene ZNF341. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene CLEC16A. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene DCLRE1C. Variant rs4565870 associates Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene IRF2BP2. Variant rs1244181 associates Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene RNF168. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene GATA3. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene IFIH1. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene CASP8. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene ITCH. 
Question: 
Out of the given list, which Gene is associated with cutaneous lupus erythematosus and immunoglobulin alpha deficiency. Given list is: DTNB,  IL10,  TNXB,  FAM13A, HLA-DQA1'
